definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

pinyin: Ka3 bo1 xi1 shi4 rou4 liu2

definition: International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC)
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Zhong1 liu2 Yan2 jiu1 Ji1 gou4

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检查在卵泡膜细胞瘤诊断中的价值。

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前两者是良性肿瘤，一般认为来自神经鞘细胞的瘤变。

sentences.english: Its skull had several spine- and wart-like protrusions.
sentences.chinese: 牠的头骨有数根尖状物与瘤状突起。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of surgical treatment of giant clival chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨型斜坡中线区脊索瘤的手术治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze CT features and reason of subdural hygroma beside cerebral falx.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析大脑镰旁硬膜下水瘤的CT表现和形成原因。

sentences.english: Objective To study CT value in diagnosing cystic lymphangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨CT对囊性淋巴管瘤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: This product becomes by the red sandalwood lump fine vulture.
sentences.chinese: 本产品由紫檀瘤精雕而成。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical characteristics and treatment of rare types of pheochromocytoma in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小儿特殊嗜铬细胞瘤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Clip was placed in the distinct place and then aneurysm coagulated with bipolar forceps and removed. Final clip was placed.
sentences.chinese: 夹放在不同的地方，然后用双极电凝去除瘤凝固。

sentences.english: Neuroblastoma is the most common extracranial solid tumor in children.
sentences.chinese: 神经母细胞瘤是儿童最常见的颅外实体肿瘤。

sentences.english: The treatment of benign giant cell tumors is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 良性巨细胞瘤的治疗争议比较大。

sentences.english: Methods The transplant tumor model of H22 hepatocarcinoma in mice was established.
sentences.chinese: 方法建立移植瘤小鼠H22肝细胞癌模型。

sentences.english: A histiocytoma in the dog is a benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 犬的组织细胞瘤是一种良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusions Complete resection of tumor is the most effective way to manage sacrum chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论骶骨脊索瘤的最佳治疗为广泛的手术切除。

sentences.english: Arsenical has been used in the treatment of hematological diseases and solid tumor widely.
sentences.chinese: 砷剂已经广泛应用于血液系统疾病和实体瘤的治疗。

sentences.english: Objective:To discover the clinical and pathological expression of skin leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨皮肤平滑肌瘤的临床病理表现。

definition: blood tumor/angioma (tumor consisting of a mass of blood vessels)
growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
